description: Parent cell is not aware of the compute nodes and aggregates in child cells. For this reason nova api running in the parent cell doesn’t list availability zones.
title: List availability zones fails in a cell setup

comments.content: Parent cell is not aware of the compute nodes and aggregates in child cells. For this reason nova api running in the parent cell doesn’t list availability zones.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~moreira-belmiro-email-lists

comments.content:
is this bug fixed?
I have the same problem.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyp19901009

comments.content: It's unclear to me why you switched this to a security vulnerability, but in the future when attempting to mark a bug as a suspected vulnerability please include your reasoning for doing so.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fungi

comments.content: I am not very familiar with the use of launchpad,and very sorry to switch this to a security vulnerability accidentally.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyp19901009
